title: Textile, ca. 1800–30
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould
description: On white ground, in red, sepia, blue with traces of yellow (double-green), two bunches of flowers separated by vertical "pillars" of row of buds and leaves flanked by thin, very wiggly columns.

tombstone.epitaph:

ca. 1800–30. Medium: cotton
